Module kivakit.core
Package com.telenav.kivakit.core.string

Class Paths

java.lang.Object
com.telenav.kivakit.core.string.Paths
public class Paths extends Object
Utility methods for working with string paths. In general, prefer StringPath and subtypes.
Author:
jonathanl (shibo)

    static String
    pathConcatenate(String head, String... tails)
    Concatenates a series of paths, ensuring that only a single slash exists between the two.
    static String
    pathHead(String path, char separator)
    Returns the first element in the given path up to the separator or null if no separator is found
    static String
    pathHead(String path, String separator)
    Returns the first element in the given path up to the separator or null if the separator is not found
    static String
    pathOptionalHead(String path, char separator)
    Returns the first element in the given path up to the separator or the path itself if no separator is found
    static String

    Returns the first element in the given path up to the separator or the path itself if the separator is not found
    static String
    pathOptionalSuffix(String path, char separator)
    Returns the last element in the given path up to the separator or the path itself if no separator is found
    static String
    pathTail(String text, char separator)
    Returns all but the first element in the path or null if the separator does not occur

    Returns all but the first element in the path or null if the separator does not occur

    Returns the given path as a package path

    Returns the last element in the given path up to the separator or the path itself if no separator is found

  • Method Details

    • pathConcatenate

      public static String pathConcatenate(String head, String... tails)
      Concatenates a series of paths, ensuring that only a single slash exists between the two. If any tail path is empty (null or ""), it is simply ignored.
      Parameters:
      head - The start of the path
      tails - The tails to concatenate to the path
      Returns:
      The concatenated path

    • pathHead

      public static String pathHead(String path, char separator)
      Returns the first element in the given path up to the separator or null if no separator is found
